description: Prove your qualifications in your Product Manager interviews, and watch experienced Product Managers go through mock strategy and technical interviews, as well as share insights about the PM interview process.
learning_outcomes: Learn how to effectively structure your responses to Product Management interview questions.
Evaluate product performance and identify areas for improvement based on relevant metrics.
Understand the key skills and abilities that impress Product Management hiring managers.
Understand how to prepare effectively for different types of Product Management interviews.
Practice answering common product strategy questions in a mock interview setting.
Apply strategic frameworks to justify product decisions during case interview questions.
title: Product Manager Interview Preparation

description: Build powerful business apps with Microsoft Power Platform.
learning_outcomes: Integrate AI Builder models into Power Apps for enhanced functionality.
Identify business problems and design Power Platform solutions to address them.
Create functional applications using Microsoft Power Apps.
Utilize data connectors to connect Power Platform applications to various data sources.
Design and implement automated workflows using Power Automate.
Develop canvas apps with multiple pages and data integration.
title: Microsoft Power Platform

description: Learn the AI skills top companies are looking for.
learning_outcomes: Employ Azure Cognitive Services for computer vision workloads
Utilize Azure Machine Learning to train and evaluate machine learning models
Describe Responsible AI and Responsible ML principles
Design machine learning pipelines using Azure Machine Learning designer
Understand core concepts of Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning
Apply automated machine learning capabilities within Azure Machine Learning
title: AI Fundamentals
